fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content

Interface ContentAccessI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentAccessSyncI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentAccessCI

    public interface ContentAccessI
extends ContentAccessSyncI
    The interface ContentAccessI defines the methods used in the DHT nodes to asynchronously access the content of the DHT.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2024-06-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <I extends ResultReceptionCI>
      void      		 get(java.lang.String computationURI, ContentKeyI key, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<I> caller)
      get the element associated with key;returning null if it is absent from the DHT; asynchronous version returning its result by calling the component waiting for the result through the caller end point.
      <I extends ResultReceptionCI>
      void      		 put(java.lang.String computationURI, ContentKeyI key, ContentDataI value, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<I> caller)
      put value associated with key in the DHT and return the previous value associated with key or null if it was not present in the DHT before; asynchronous version returning its result by calling the component waiting for the result through the caller end point.
      <I extends ResultReceptionCI>
      void      		 remove(java.lang.String computationURI, ContentKeyI key, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<I> caller)
      remove the value associated with key from the DHT; asynchronous version returning its result by calling the component waiting for the result through the caller end point.

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content.ContentAccessSyncI

        clearComputation, getSync, putSync, removeSync

    • Method Detail

      • get

        <I extends ResultReceptionCI> void get(java.lang.String computationURI,
                                       ContentKeyI key,
                                       fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<I> caller)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        get the element associated with key;returning null if it is absent from the DHT; asynchronous version returning its result by calling the component waiting for the result through the caller end point.

        Contract

         pre     computationURI != null && !computationURI.isEmpty()
 pre     key != null
 pre     caller != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of the result reception interface.
        Parameters:
        computationURI - URI of the computation.
        key - the key to the sought value.
        caller - end point to which the result must be forwarded.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • put

        <I extends ResultReceptionCI> void put(java.lang.String computationURI,
                                       ContentKeyI key,
                                       ContentDataI value,
                                       fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<I> caller)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        put value associated with key in the DHT and return the previous value associated with key or null if it was not present in the DHT before; asynchronous version returning its result by calling the component waiting for the result through the caller end point.

        Contract

         pre     computationURI != null && !computationURI.isEmpty()
 pre     key != null
 pre     caller != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of the result reception interface.
        Parameters:
        computationURI - URI of the computation.
        key - the key to which value will be associated.
        value - the value to be added to the DHT.
        caller - end point to which the result must be forwarded.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • remove

                                          ContentKeyI key,

                                   throws java.lang.Exception

 pre     caller != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
